name: Dr Pilly World of Pills
description:
Align the pills and viruses to form four blocks of the same color.

Dr Pilly is an addictive puzzle game !

Destroy all viruses of the bottle using the color pills.
To destroy a virus you must line up at least 4 blocks of the same color horizontally or vertically.

- 20 levels
- 4 speeds for tougher difficulty
- 48 achievements to unlock (Android only)
- Save your best scores on your phone and compare the worldwide top 3 !

If you like the game, a small comment is greatly appreciated :)
